description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use your trusty Magnet Cannon and Obnoxiously Big Legs to solve countless puzzles. Push, pull, lift, and leap your way to victory. Dozens of secret rooms filled with prizes await your discovery. What are you still reading for!?
